alert.note: Alert for Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 13 at 12:11AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Baker, northwestern Union, central Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Obrien, or 13 miles northwest of Ichetucknee Spring, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake City, Columbia, Palestine Community, Five Points, Watertown, Lulu, Winfield, Obrien and Mcalpin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
